posts.name: AENON The Health Kitchen
posts.description: AENON Health Kitchen, a hygienic restaurant that provides simple, palatable, wholesome & healthy food at affordable prices. We are dedicated in offering an extraordinary dining experience and providing consumers the opportunity to learn on healthy lifestyle. Health is a choice, not a chance!
posts.address: 1, Jalan 4/93, Taman Miharja, Jalan Cheras, 55200 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan
